main event: Three orange colored lights were observed moving rapidly in a straight line before disappearing instantaneously on April 4, 1959.
interesting points: The lights were observed for a duration of 2 minutes,The observers used binoculars to confirm the sighting,Weather conditions were clear at the time of observation,Local FAA and AEC agencies reported no unusual sightings in the area,One of the witnesses was a school teacher and another was a petroleum maintenance technician.
witness description: civilian witnesses, including a school teacher and a petroleum maintenance technician
